home.title: A curated, informative and educational resource on data and metadata standards, inter-related to databases and data policies.
home.subtitle: We guide consumers to discover, select and use these resources with confidence, and producers to make their resource more discoverable, more widely adopted and cited.

standard.title: Standards
standard.subtitle: A registry of terminology artefacts, models/formats, reporting guidelines, and identifier schemas.

standards.title: Standards
standards.subtitle: A registry of terminology artefacts, models/formats, reporting guidelines, and identifier schemas.

database.title: Databases
database.subtitle: A registry of knowledgebases and repositories of data and other digital assets.

databases.title: Databases
databases.subtitle: A registry of knowledgebases and repositories of data and other digital assets.

policy.title: Policies
policy.subtitle: A registry of data preservation, management and sharing policies from international funding agencies, regulators, journals, and other organisations.

policies.title: Policies
policies.subtitle: A registry of data preservation, management and sharing policies from international funding agencies, regulators, journals, and other organisations.

collection.title: Collections
collection.subtitle: Collections group together one or more types of resource (standard, database or policy) by domain, project or organisation. A Recommendation is a core-set of resources that are selected or endorsed by data policies from journals, funders or other organisations.

collections.title: Collections
collections.subtitle: Collections group together one or more types of resource (standard, database or policy) by domain, project or organisation. A Recommendation is a core-set of resources that are selected or endorsed by data policies from journals, funders or other organisations.

statistics.title: Summary Statistics
statistics.subtitle: A selection of charts describing the standards, databases and data policies stored within the FAIRsharing registries

license.title: Licence
license.subtitle: Using FAIRsharing content through the web or through our API

terms_of_use.title: Acceptable Use Policy and Conditions of Use

user.title: User private profile page
user.subtitle: Preview all the information related to your FAIRsharing account.

search.title: Search
search.subtitle: Search the FAIRsharing records using advanced filtering

api documentation.title: FAIRsharing API documentation
api documentation.subtitle: How to use the FAIRsharing REST API for for querying and modifying records

educational.title: Educational
educational.subtitle: About standards, their use in databases and policies, and how we can help you.

community.title: Community: adopters, activities and governance
community.subtitle: FAIRsharing is a community-driven resource with a growing number of users and collaborators, all working to enable the FAIR Principles and to make standards, databases and policies FAIR.

new.title: Adding content in FAIRsharing
new.subtitle: Describe your standard, database or data policy with us to make it more discoverable, more widely adopted and cited.

communitycuration.title: FAIRsharing Community Champions Programme
communitycuration.subtitle: Put your expertise into action and get credited by joining our Community Champions programme.
